# Missing responses analyses

## Missing responses by person

### Separate functions

```{r missing responses by person with separate functions}
?scaling::mvp_analysis
mv_p <- scaling::mvp_analysis(
  resp = resp,
  vars = vars,
  select = 'mixed',
  valid = 'valid',
  grouping = c('easy', 'difficult'),
  mvs = mvs,
  save = FALSE,
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Results'
)

?scaling::mvp_plots
scaling::mvp_plots(
  mv_p = mv_p,
  vars = vars,
  select = 'mixed',
  grouping = c('easy', 'difficult'),
  mvs = mvs,
  labels_mvs = labels_mvs,
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Plots/Missing_Responses/by_person',
  show_all = TRUE,
  #show_all = FALSE,
  name_grouping = 'test difficulty'#,
  #labels_legend = c('A', 'B', 'C')
)

?scaling::mvp_table
scaling::mvp_table(
  mv_p = mv_p,
  grouping = c('easy', 'difficult'),
  mvs = mvs,
  save = FALSE,
  overwrite = TRUE,
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Tables'
)

?scaling::print_mvp_results
scaling::print_mvp_results(mv_p)

rm(mv_p)
```

# IRT analyses

## For all items

### Separate functions

```{r single IRT analysis with separate functions, eval = FALSE}
# Rasch and 2PL
?scaling::irt_model
rasch <- scaling::irt_model(
  resp = resp,
  vars = vars,
  select = 'dich',
  valid = 'valid',
  irtmodel = '1PL',
  save = FALSE,
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Results',
  name_group = 'all',
  pweights = NULL,
  #pweights = 'difficulty',
  control_tam = NULL,
  #control_tam = list(Msteps = 10, convM = 0.1), # wenn man snodes verändert, wird eine Fehlermeldung ausgegeben
  control_wle = NULL
  #control_wle = list(Msteps = 10, convM = 0.1)
)

irt.2pl <- scaling::irt_model(
  resp = resp,
  vars = vars,
  select = 'dich',
  valid = 'valid',
  irtmodel = '2PL',
  save = FALSE,
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Results',
  name_group = 'all',
  pweights = NULL,
  #pweights = 'difficulty',
  control_tam = NULL,
  #control_tam = list(Msteps = 10, convM = 0.1), # wenn man snodes verändert, funktioniert das Ganze nicht mehr
  control_wle = NULL
  #control_wle = list(Msteps = 10, convM = 0.1)
)

?scaling::icc_plots
scaling::icc_plots(
  model = rasch,
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Plots',
  name_group = 'all'
)

?scaling::wright_map
scaling::wright_map(
  model = rasch,
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Plots',
  name_group = 'all'
)

?scaling::irt_summary()
rasch_sum <- scaling::irt_summary(
  resp = resp,
  vars = vars,
  valid = 'valid',
  results = rasch,
  disc = irt.2pl,
  save = FALSE,
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Tables',
  name_group = 'all',
  overwrite = TRUE
)

?scaling::irt_model_fit()
scaling::irt_model_fit(
  model_1p = rasch,
  model_2p = irt.2pl,
  overwrite = TRUE,
  save = TRUE,
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Tables',
  name_group = 'all'
)

?scaling::print_irt_summary
scaling::print_irt_summary(
  model = rasch,
  irt_sum = rasch_sum
)

rm(rasch, irt.2pl, rasch_sum)

# PCM and GPCM
?scaling::irt_model
pcm <- scaling::irt_model(
  resp = resp,
  vars = vars,
  select = 'dich',
  valid = 'valid',
  irtmodel = 'PCM2',

  control_wle = NULL
  #control_wle = list(Msteps = 10, convM = 0.1)
)

gpcm <- scaling::irt_model(
  resp = resp,
  vars = vars,
  select = 'dich',

  #control_wle = list(Msteps = 10, convM = 0.1)

?scaling::icc_plots
scaling::icc_plots(
  model = pcm,
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Plots',

?scaling::wright_map
scaling::wright_map(
  model = pcm,
```

# DIF analysis

## Separate functions

```{r dif analysis with separate functions}
# For Rasch

## One DIF variable
?scaling::dif_model
dif_sex <- scaling::dif_model(
  resp = resp,
  vars = vars,
  select = 'dich',
  valid = 'valid',
  dif_var = 'sex',
  scoring = 'irt_scoring',
  include_mv = 200,
  control = NULL,
  #control = list(Msteps = 10, convM = 0.1),
  pweights = NULL,
  #pweights = 'difficulty',
  save = FALSE,
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Results',
  name_group = 'all'
)

dif_diff <- scaling::dif_model(
  resp = resp,
  vars = vars,
  select = 'dich_common',
  valid = 'valid',
  dif_var = 'difficulty',
  scoring = 'irt_scoring',
  include_mv = 200,
  control = NULL,
  #control = list(Msteps = 10, convM = 0.1),
  pweights = NULL,
  #pweights = 'difficulty',
  save = FALSE,
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Results',
  name_group = 'all'
)

?scaling::dif_summary
sex_sum <- scaling::dif_summary(
  diflist = dif_sex,
  vars = vars,
  #dif_threshold = 0.2,
  save = FALSE,
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Tables',
  overwrite = TRUE,
  name_group = 'all'
)

diff_sum <- scaling::dif_summary(
  diflist = dif_diff,
  vars = vars,
  #dif_threshold = 0.2,
  save = FALSE,
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Tables',
  overwrite = TRUE,
  name_group = 'all'
)

?scaling::build_dif_tr_tables

  dif_summaries = list(diff_sum = diff_sum,sex_sum = sex_sum),
  vars = vars,
  save = FALSE,
  overwrite = TRUE,
  name_group = 'all',
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Tables'
)

  resp,
  diflist = dif_sex,
  res = sex_sum,
  dif_threshold = 0.5
)

  resp = resp,
  vars = vars,
  select = 'mixed',
```

```{r dimensionality analysis with separate functions}
  dim = c('kog_type', 'text_type'),
  irtmodel = 'PCM2',
  maxiter = 10,
  snodes = 5,
  save = FALSE,
  name_group = 'all',
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Results'
)

?scaling::dim_summary

  dim,
  save = FALSE,
  overwrite = TRUE,
  name_group = 'all',
  path = 'C:/Users/ba4eb5/Desktop/Skalierung/Skalierungspaket/Test/B129/Version 1.1.0/Tables'
)

?scaling::print_dim_summary
scaling::print_dim_summary(dim_sum)

rm(dim, dim_sum)
```
